issue.title: [CF 447] Yet another animation option.
issue.body:

Nevermind. I went to implement this and I realized why I scrapped it in the first place. Blizzard's positioning code is extremely quirky when it comes to scaling things. Basically, no matter how I go about this one, the icon will move towards and away from the top left corner of the group as it scales.
